nodes.text: Alliance Strategy and Tactics Lecture series

The Alliance Strategy and Tactics Lectures were a series of holographic lectures recorded and distributed by the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Ministry of Education. The lectures covered military and governmental issues and were distributed to mid-ranking political and military leaders. There were at least five hundred twenty-two lectures. Notable lectures from the series included Alliance Strategy and Tactics Lecture 137: Combat Starfighters, Alliance Maintenance Lecture 139: Battle Maintenance Schedule for an X-wing Starfighter, and Lecture Number 522: Organization of Alliance Command.
